attributes.action: force fellow members of Parliament to use smaller and more fuel efficient cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the constant rise in the cost of living forced upon the PUBLIC by this labour government. Would Mr Browns credibility be more believable if he and the other labour MP's led by example and used electric cars to get to and from their OVERSIZED LONDON APARTMENTS that the TAX PAYER PAYS FOR,  to their offices, rather than being driven around London at the TAX PAYERS EXPENSE in their heavy gas guzzelling limosine style motorcades

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
